attributes.description:
This vehicle is 100% financeable.
Give us a call today to apply. 
Finance price is R10 000 more due to terms & conditions on a finance deal. The vehicle goes in for AA Dekra test, if any faults are found on the vehicle it shall be attended to at the cost of the dealership. If the vehicle is due for a service it’s carried out at the cost of the dealership. ETC....
Contact: 065 846 2101 | 061 405 0994 | 063 341 5331 | 011 433 2555
Visit our website for the best car deals today! WWW.TTTWHEELS.CO.ZA  
Looking to sell your car? We can give you cash! We also accept Trade-ins! 
ADDRESS:
1 TOTIUS STREET, RIDGEWAY
